programme.title: NHL Hockey New Jersey Devils at Chicago Blackhawks
programme.sub-title: New Jersey Devils at Chicago Blackhawks
programme.desc: The Devils start a road trip in search of a sixth straight win over the Blackhawks. Timo Meier and Dawson Mercer each had a goal and an assist as New Jersey scored all its goals in the third period of a 4-1 verdict versus Chicago on Dec. 14, 2024.

programme.desc: The Oilers return to the ice for a rubber match against the Stars. Edmonton has won four of its last five outings despite being without injured superstars Connor McDavid and Leon Draisaitl for part of that stretch. Dallas is 18-14-2 on the road.
